title: So I just DC'd from a match for 25 minuets......
body:
After frantically trying to reconnect with persistent failures, then next thing I know I get back in still with high ping only **level 3** 
against some **level 16** opponents......

Seriously?  It's bad enough I DC from the game for that long ensuring the enemies victory but now I'm also the level 3 free kill? 

Just icing on the already terrible cake.

GG
